explains: n. （尤指青少年的）犯罪，不良行为；拖欠债务；玩忽职守
wordGroup: juvenile delinquency 少年违法犯罪

sentences.en: He had no history of delinquency.
With correct guidance and good parenting, I believe juvenile delinquency can be reduced.
sentences.cn: 有正确的引导和良好的教养，我相信青少年犯罪的事件是可以减少的。

sentences.en: With the correct guidance and good parenting, I believe juvenile delinquency can be reduced.
sentences.cn: 我相信在正确引导和良好教养下，青少年犯罪可以减少。
